thread.title: McHugh pitches Astros to 5-2 win over Royals to open ALDS
thread.title_full: McHugh pitches Astros to 5-2 win over Royals to open ALDS

title: McHugh pitches Astros to 5-2 win over Royals to open ALDS
text:
> Top News McHugh pitches Astros to 5-2 win over Royals to open ALDS Kansas City Royals' Kendrys Morales watches his solo home run during the fourth inning in Game 1 of baseball's American League Division Series against the Houston Astros, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo. (AP Photo/Charlie Riedel)
